title: Flatland_Movie  not the Ladd Ehlinger one.mov
description:
This is another movie version of Flatland, still quite accurate to the book by edwin abbott, an english school teacher, with referenses to the class struggle in jolly olde england, early in the 1900's, but really good for math / topology students in highschool or college. It's animated...since they couldn't find anyone so thin that they are 2 dimensions! 
The book, flatland: a romance in many dimensions (by edwin abbott) was given to me by my college math professor, one day in calculus and analytical geometry.
